title: Did Pelosi Give George Floyd’s Family a US Flag Meant To Honor Vets?
subtitle: The claim circulated after Floyd's brother called attention at a Congressional hearing to racism by American cops.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On June 10, 2020, U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi presented Philonise Floyd, a brother to George Floyd, a folded American flag — a gesture that's exclusively for honoring veterans.
